Modelling Plant Height

Source: vignettes/height-model.Rmd
height-model.Rmd

Loading libraries 

library(exploreHTP)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggpubr)
library(purrr)

Exploring data explorer() 

data(dt_chips)
results <- explorer(dt_chips, x = DAP, y = c(PH, Canopy), id = Plot)
names(results)
#> [1] "summ_traits"    "metadata"       "locals_min_max" "dt_long"       
#> [5] ".keep"

Data exploration 

p1 <- plot(results, type = "evolution", return_gg = TRUE)
p2 <- plot(results, type = "time_by_trait", return_gg = TRUE)
ggarrange(p1, p2, nrow = 2)

Estimating days to emergence

f(t;t1,t2,k)={0if t<t1kt2âˆ’t1â‹…(tâˆ’t1)if t1â‰¤tâ‰¤t2kif t>t2\begin{equation} f(t; t_1, t_2, k) = \begin{cases} 0 & \text{if } t < t_1 \\ \dfrac{k}{t_2 - t_1} \cdot (t - t_1) & \text{if } t_1 \leq t \leq t_2 \\ k & \text{if } t > t_2 \end{cases} \end{equation}

Fitting models for canopy 

fixed_params <- results |>
  pluck("dt_long") |>
  filter(var %in% "Canopy" & uid %in% c(195, 40)) |>
  group_by(uid) |>
  summarise(k = max(y), .groups = "drop")
mod_1 <- dt_chips |>
  modeler(
    x = DAP,
    y = Canopy,
    grp = Plot,
    id = c(195, 40),
    parameters = c(t1 = 45, t2 = 80, k = 0.9),
    fn = "fn_piwise",
    fixed_params = fixed_params,
    add_zero = TRUE,
    max_as_last = TRUE
  )
plot(mod_1, id = c(195, 40))

kable(mod_1$param)
uid t1 t2 sse k auc
40 36.97210 64.17621 9.550087 100 5442.583
195 34.34827 66.50274 70.106179 100 5457.449

Target function for plant height

fn_exp2_exp()

f(t;t1,t2,Î±,Î²)={0if t<t1eÎ±â‹…(tâˆ’t1)2âˆ’1if t1â‰¤tâ‰¤t2(eÎ±â‹…(t2âˆ’t1)2âˆ’1)â‹…eÎ²â‹…(tâˆ’t2)if t>t2\begin{equation} f(t; t_1, t_2, \alpha, \beta) = \begin{cases} 0 & \text{if } t < t_1 \\ e^{\alpha \cdot (t - t_1)^2} - 1 & \text{if } t_1 \leq t \leq t_2 \\ \left(e^{\alpha \cdot (t_2 - t_1)^2} - 1\right) \cdot e^{\beta \cdot (t - t_2)} & \text{if } t > t_2 \end{cases} \end{equation}

Fixing parameters and providing initial values 

fixed_params <- mod_1 |>
  pluck("param") |>
  select(uid, t1)
kable(fixed_params)
uid t1
40 36.97210
195 34.34827 
initials <- mod_1 |>
  pluck("param") |>
  select(uid, t1, t2) |>
  mutate(alpha = 1 / 600, beta = -1 / 30)
kable(initials)
uid t1 t2 alpha beta
40 36.97210 64.17621 0.0016667 -0.0333333
195 34.34827 66.50274 0.0016667 -0.0333333

Fitting models for plant height

Using t1 from the previous model as a fixed parameter and using t2 as initial parameter per plot.

mod_2 <- dt_chips |>
  modeler(
    x = DAP,
    y = PH,
    grp = Plot,
    id = c(195, 40),
    fn = "fn_exp2_exp",
    initial_vals = initials,
    fixed_params = fixed_params,
    add_zero = TRUE
  )
plot(mod_2, id = c(195, 40))

kable(mod_2$param)
uid t2 alpha beta sse t1 auc
40 64.55506 0.0009623 -0.0424267 0.0031173 36.97210 29.37982
195 62.00000 0.0008740 -0.0197663 0.0144664 34.34827 35.16225

Code 

data(dt_chips)
results <- explorer(dt_chips, x = DAP, y = c(PH, Canopy), id = Plot)
fixed_params <- results |>
  pluck("dt_long") |>
  filter(var %in% "Canopy" & uid %in% c(195, 40)) |>
  group_by(uid) |>
  summarise(k = max(y), .groups = "drop")
mod_1 <- dt_chips |>
  modeler(
    x = DAP,
    y = Canopy,
    grp = Plot,
    id = c(195, 40),
    parameters = c(t1 = 45, t2 = 80, k = 0.9),
    fn = "fn_piwise",
    fixed_params = fixed_params,
    add_zero = TRUE,
    max_as_last = TRUE
  )
fixed_params <- mod_1 |>
  pluck("param") |>
  select(uid, t1)
initials <- mod_1 |>
  pluck("param") |>
  select(uid, t1, t2) |>
  mutate(alpha = 1 / 600, beta = -1 / 30)
mod_2 <- dt_chips |>
  modeler(
    x = DAP,
    y = PH,
    grp = Plot,
    id = c(195, 40),
    fn = "fn_exp2_exp",
    initial_vals = initials,
    fixed_params = fixed_params,
    add_zero = TRUE
  )
